text: @narendramodi @vijayrupanibjp Sir I had written to you many times recently about a siddha medicinal preparation which is 5000 yrs old . This is being distributed in TN which is giving good results . It's called as KABASURAKUDINEER  for the cure of COVID19 . It's cure as well as prevention . Please use in guj
